analysis.key_quote: Civil service should be non-partisan and putting people loyal to one party or another will do nothing to combat fraud/waste/abuse and will only lead to the further demise of federal services and our democracy as a whole.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the politicization of civil service, emphasizing the importance of non-partisanship and the negative consequences of political loyalty, which aligns with concerns about the integrity of federal services.
